product_name: The North Face Apex Android Hooded Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Apex Android hooded jacket is a soft shell you can count on. It blocks the wind and keeps you warm on gusty days. Android is a stretch alternative to hard-shell outerwear and can be combined with fleece liners of various lofts to create highly thermal outerwear. Use Android for mid-levels of aerobic activity (hiking, skiing, snowboarding) or in colder weather. Offering solid performance, Apex ClimateBlock stretch laminated fleece is windproof, ultra water resistant and breathable; fleece backer enhances moisture wicking and warmth. Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Attached, fully adjustable brimmed hood adds protection when the weather gets brutal; high collar protects neck when fully zipped up. Windflap backs front zipper. Non-abrasive, adjustable cuff tabs and hem drawcord help hold in warmth. 2 zippered hand pockets and a zip bicep pocket.
short_description: The North Face Apex Android hooded jacket is a soft shell you can count on. It blocks the wind and keeps you warm on gusty days.
